Docs.summary: 表示一个 列，该列在其单元格中承载 元素。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>以显示包含的数据<xref:System.Uri>，如 HTTP 地址或电子邮件地址。 下图显示的示例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>。
![电子邮件地址的 DataGridHyperlinkColumn](~/add/media/wpf-hyperlinkcolumn.png "电子邮件地址的 DataGridHyperlinkColumn")
> [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> 仅当任一时才可以进行导航的直接或间接父<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>导航宿主。 导航主机的示例包括<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>，或可以承载任何浏览器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]，如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)]或更高版本和 Firefox 2.0 或更高版本。 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"导航主机"主题[导航概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)。
若要填充列，将绑定到列<xref:System.Uri>使用数据<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A>属性。 若要显示不同的 URI 字符串的超链接文本，请将绑定到的文本值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn.ContentBinding%2A>属性。 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A>属性应用于<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>列中创建的元素。 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>单元格处于每个单元中的元素是行的数据项目。 因此，若要将绑定设置你只需设置<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。 或者，可以指定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果你想要将数据转换。 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md)。
> [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn> 创建<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>非编辑模式中的元素和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>在编辑模式下的元素。
如果你想要显示其他类型的数据，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>提供下列类型：
|列名称|数据显示| |-----------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>|用于显示布尔数据。| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|用于显示枚举数据。| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|用于显示文本。|
如果你想要使用中的其他控件你<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>，你可以通过创建自己的列类型<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>。
## Examples 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>设置<xref:System.Uri>与<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A>属性并将超链接文本<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn.ContentBinding%2A>属性。 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink.Click?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件将自动处理，因为<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>父级的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>。
[!code-xaml[DataGrid_CustomColumns#HyperlinkA](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml#hyperlinka)] [!code-xaml[DataGrid_CustomColumns#HyperlinkB](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml#hyperlinkb)] [!code-xaml[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Hyperlink1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml#hyperlink1)] [!code-xaml[DataGrid_CustomColumns#HyperlinkC](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml#hyperlinkc)]
[!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Top](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#top)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Top](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#top)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#All2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#all2)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#All2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#all2)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#CustomerClass](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#customerclass)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#CustomerClass](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#customerclass)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#AllEnd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#allend)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#AllEnd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#allend)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Hyperlink3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#hyperlink3)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Hyperlink3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#hyperlink3)]
